thread.section_title: Regtransfers.co.uk Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Regtransfers.co.uk | www.regtransfers.co.uk | 4 of 59
thread.title: Jeanne Reddick

author: Jeanne Reddick
title: Jeanne Reddick
text:
I must admit I was a bit dubious, I'd paid my money and received confirmation regarding my chosen number plate. Something at the back of my mind started to question the legitimacy, could it be a scam? there seem to be so many going on.
I went online only to read fantastic reviews, could they be made up? I emailed the company and received acknowledgement and assurance, I also telephoned and again received assurance.
Everything was legitimate, having placed the order last Monday I was driving with my new plates on Friday!! Amazing! The whole process was so easy, and I was kept informed of the progress throughout.
I would highly recommend this company.
